attributes.additional_details:
Why should Someone in a Rural location  have to  pay   a lot more to get connected to a landeline then someone living in a city the same Distance from a telephone exchange.


Why has the Britsh Goverment given over £150 Million Pounds to BT ( which By the way is tax payes money)  an is getting more to improve the broadband , when poeple don't have phone lines as BT like to charge what they like !


Why does the Britsh goverment does not do more to help rural areas get Acces to phone lines at a normal cost at not at price of a small mortgage,
